tweet: The early years of our children’s lives are crucial to their education. @HHSgov awarded a $1.88 million grant to the Southern Seven Health Department's Head Start program so that kids in Alexander, Pulaski & Union counties are prepared for the classroom. http://bit.ly/2OwraRu

Despite the hyper partisanship and political games being played in Washington, D.C., I’ve been focused on fighting for Southern Illinoisans. Check out some of the legislation I’ve introduced and supported so far in 2019. pic.twitter.com/SIRJnrCJmL

Excited to announce that the Veterans Airport of Southern Illinois in Marion will receive a $673,000 grant from @USDOT. This investment will help grow the local economy & connect Southern Illinois w/transportation hubs around the country for years to come. http://bit.ly/2SSQIXv
Congratulations to my good friend & @CCHS165 alum @RepRatcliffe for being chosen as @POTUS’s nominee for Director of National Intelligence. I know he will serve our nation well.

During votes, we had a moment of silence in honor of fallen Capitol Police Officer Jacob Chestnut & Detective John Gibson, who lost their lives defending the US Capitol from an armed gunman in 1998. Southern Illinois is home to one of American history’s great civilizations, Cahokia. Today, more than 70 earth mounds still stand. I spoke on the House floor about my bill to make Cahokia Mounds a national park so that we can preserve this piece of history for future generations. pic.twitter.com/8J44c34EAg

Today, the Senate came together to permanently reauthorize the 9/11 Victim Compensation Fund with a bipartisan vote of 97-2. I am honored to have cosponsored and voted for this bill in the House. Now, it's off to @POTUS's desk for his signature. https://nbcnews.to/2YqLdEI

For years, we’ve warned that the Len Small Levee breach was a navigation hazard. Sadly, recent floods proved us right. To fix the levee, we must 1st fix the law. I introduced a bill w/Rep. Finkenauer to close a gap in the law that's stalled repair efforts.  http://bit.ly/30RqYh0  pic.twitter.com/oH1NBlDLAJ

The Cadillac Tax, Obamacare's 40% tax on some employer-sponsored health insurance plans, undermines private health insurance & means costlier care for families. Proud to cosponsor & vote for the Middle Class Health Benefits Tax Repeal Act to repeal it. http://bit.ly/2JOTdpH

Did you know that July is National Park and Recreation Month? I’m proud to be working with @HLCSWIL and local leaders in Southern Illinois on legislation to make @CahokiaMounds a national park. Stay tuned for more tomorrow. http://bit.ly/2XKiPOk
